$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/UnderTidd.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/UnderTiddler
$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/UnderTidd.text:
<$let thisCurrentTiddler=<<currentTiddler>> > 
  <!--
    Filter to find if current tiddler added a SuperTag
    all[current] - tiddler
    tags[] - SuperTag and other tags
    tags[] - TraitTag and other tags
    tags[] - $:/SuperTag/TraitTag and other tags
  -->
  <$list filter="[all[current]tags[]tags[]tags[]match[$:/SuperTag/TraitTag]then<thisCurrentTiddler>]">

    <$supertag-form />
    <!-- <$json-editor-form filter="[all[current]debug-log[]tags[]tags[]] :filter[tags[]match[$:/SuperTag/TraitTag]] :and[get[schema]]" tiddler=<<currentTiddler>> /> -->

  </$list>
</$let>

$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/readme.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/readme
$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/readme.creator: LinOnetwo
$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/readme.text:
See following resources to learn how to use:

* "Talk" forum post [[SuperTag plugin, auto-generate a field editor on view template|https://talk.tiddlywiki.org/t/supertag-plugin-auto-generate-a-field-editor-on-view-template/6245]]
* Demo site [SuperTag plugin's demo site](https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/super-tag/)
* Github: https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/super-tag

$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/widgets/s.title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/widgets/supertag-form/usePalette.css
$:/plugins/linonetwo/super-tag/widgets/s.text:
<$importvariables filter="[[$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/base]]">

button.btn.btn-primary {
  background: <<colour button-background>>;
  border-color:<<colour button-border>>;
  color: <<colour button-foreground>>;
}
button.btn.btn-primary:hover, button.btn.btn-primary:active, button.btn.btn-primary:focus {
	background-color: <<colour button-background-hover>>;
  border-color:<<colour button-border>>;
  color: <<colour button-foreground>>;
}

</$importvariables>
